thread.title: Ghana midfielder Sulley Muntari returns action after injury, features in Ittihad win
thread.title_full: Ghana midfielder Sulley Muntari returns action after injury, features in Ittihad win

title: Ghana midfielder Sulley Muntari returns action after injury, features in Ittihad win
text:
13:40 CET Ghana midfielder Sulley Muntari returns action after injury, features in Ittihad win - www.ghanasoccernet.com 
Ghana midfielder Sulley Muntari returned to action in Saudi Arabia for his club Al Ittihad on Saturday after a one-month injury-induced absence. 
The former AC Milan was in full time action on Saturday as they defeated 10-man Al Qadasiya 3-1 thanks to a hat-trick from Gelmin Rivas in the Saudi Pro League. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
